about_the_game:
Step into the World of High Fashion with Emily, the Elegant Model!

Experience the Glamour of High Fashion with Emily

Embark on a glamorous romantic journey with Emily, a former top model who exudes elegance and loves high fashion. This captivating content invites you to explore a world of style, sophistication, and designer labels as you connect with this sophisticated character.

About Emily:

  • Glamorous Dates: Experience unforgettable dates filled with luxury, from exclusive fashion shows to elegant dinner parties.

  • Shared Passions: Discover Emily's love for fashion, beauty, and the finer things in life, and share your own passions with her.

  • Romantic Moments: Create lasting memories as you build a strong emotional connection with Emily.

  • Stunning Visuals: Immerse yourself in beautifully environments and character designs that bring Emily's world to life.

Perfect for Fans of:

  • Romantic visual novels

  • Dating simulators

  • Fashion

  • Luxury lifestyle

Don't miss your chance to experience the glamour of Emily's story. Purchase the DLC today and start your own high-fashion romance!

Emily, a former top model, exudes elegance and loves high fashion. She aspires to start her own clothing brand.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains full nudity, front and back of several all characters

You can set up a scene and simulate sex with a 3D model.

The animations simulate sexual positions, and it is possible to move the camera freely around the scene, having a complete perspective of the sexual act.

There is nothing forced in the game.

All situations and characters were made just to simulate pleasure in a passionate and light way.

It is possible to see in detail the characters facial expressions and erogenous zones, including genitalias. 

You must be legal age of majority or over to play this game.
